title: Yelets
summaries: The Yelets is a Hardmode yoyo. After defeating any mechanical boss, this yoyo has a 0.5*1/200 (0.5%) chance to drop from any enemy killed in the Jungle and Underground Jungle, including in the Jungle Temple.
It has a spin duration of 14 seconds, and can reach up to 18 tiles.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Sell: 5
